column1: '''''Mallorn'' 23''' is the twenty-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s annual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)
column2: Mallorn]]'', published in the summer of [[1986]]. The issue includes the poem ''[[Goblin Feet]]'' by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
